welcome_messages.en: Welcome to AgriConnect! We're here to help you with agricultural information and support. How can we assist you today?
welcome_messages.sw: Karibu AgriConnect! Tuko hapa kukusaidia kwa taarifa na msaada wa kilimo. Tunaweza kukusaidiaje leo?

ticket_closed.en: Your inquiry (Ticket #{ticket_number}) has been resolved. Thank you for using AgriConnect! If you have more questions, feel free to send us a message anytime.
ticket_closed.sw: Swali lako (Tiketi #{ticket_number}) limeshughulikiwa. Asante kwa kutumia AgriConnect! Ukiwa na maswali zaidi, tuma ujumbe wakati wowote.
